alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 2:26PM CST until January 24 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...In Kansas, Jewell, Mitchell, and Osborne Counties. In Nebraska, Nuckolls and Thayer Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
